attributes.action: to increase the hourly rate of pay to a minimum of £8.00hr for care and support workers and pay accordingly to level of nvq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is put in place to reward those who support and care for the elderly either within a care setting or domicillary private or within the social services,and too pay accordingly to nvq level i.e, nvq 1-2 £8.00+ per hr, nvq 3 £8.50+ ect. a care assistant and support workers role is a very important role and staff within these positions are not rewarded enough. it is a very difficult, and emotional job to be in, it takes a special person to fullfill the standards and quality of care that the elderly service users need, however excellent experianced, qualified staff are hard to come by due to the minimum wage in place and many are changing career paths or many are going to work within the nhs, which results in staffing levels, bad practice and poor standards. if there was better pay the standards would rise and the elderly would get the care they deserve.
